      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Country(java.lang.String name, Continent continent, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> neighbooringCountriesName, int xCoordinate, int yCoordinate)
      This is a Constructor for Country class which sets name, continent, neighbooring countries and xaxis and yaxis of the country.
